channel.title: My staff meeting todo
channel.description: [s]maps torrent[/s] serverstatus page (what is url? moparcraft.net/ ?) serverstatus tags in addition to version (what should the tags be?)

item.title: My staff meeting todo
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“kickingjamie, post:4, topic:469049”]For tags I’d say: Survival mode, creative mode, hardcore mode, adventure mode, vanilla, bukkit, tekkit, pvp, pve, economy, fractions. The version of the server should also be a tag.

Another point is do we allow white listed servers on the status page?[/quote]

The version should be separate, you can have multiple tags, but you can’t have multiple versions.

As a matter of policy, no, as a technical matter, there isn’t really any good way to stop them.

Read full topic

item.title: My staff meeting todo
item.dc:creator: @omgilikepie omgilikepie
item.description:
@omgilikepie wrote:

No point in posting a white listed server in the first place is there? :o

Read full topic

For tags I’d say: Survival mode, creative mode, hardcore mode, adventure mode, vanilla, bukkit, tekkit, pvp, pve, economy, fractions. The version of the server should also be a tag.

Another point is do we allow white listed servers on the status page?

item.title: My staff meeting todo
item.dc:creator: @omgilikepie omgilikepie
item.description:
@omgilikepie wrote:

I’d say make the url ‘moparcraft.net/status’ Makes it simple and easy to remember

Server status tags: Vanilla, Bukkit, PvP, faction, economy, online/offline mode

I’ll check later, or someone else can help me, to see what main tags should be

Read full topic
